prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Information and material gathered by Special Collections and Archive staff from the GMU men's basketball program.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The George Mason men's basketball team, the Patriots under the leadership of Coach Jim Larranaga was unsure if they would make the NCAA Tournament even after a strong regular season in 2006. In a controversial decision the Patriots were granted a spot in the Tournament but were expected to lose within the first rounds. But after defeating the past two national champions and the Washington D.C. region's No. 1 seed, the Patriots were able to climb into the national spotlight and justify their position in the Tournament.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: programs, tickets, flyer, posters and other items from the 2005-2006 season.
